column1: 12. If answer to question (1) above is “No” i.e. not all Principles are covered b
column2: a policy, reasons to be stated:

column1: The Company does not consider the Principles material to its business
The Company is not at a stage where it is in a position to formulate and implement the policies on specified principles
The Company does not have the financial or/human and technical resources available for the task
It is planned to be done in the next financial year
